section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: #include <string.h> int strncmp(const char *a, const char * b, size_t length);

section.title: Description
section.p: strncmp compares up to length characters from the string at a to the string at b.

section.title: Returns
section.p: If *a sorts lexicographically after *b, strncmp returns a number greater than zero. If the two strings are equivalent, strncmp returns zero. If *a sorts lexicographically before *b, strncmp returns a number less than zero.
